Text:
Sorry to wake your paranoia: This torrent is attracting a suspicious number of IP spies, my safeguard has already blocked several addresses. If you use Azureus, be sure you have installed the plugin http://azureus.sourceforge.net/plugin_details.php?plugin=safepeer
or have a look at something like http://downloads.vnunet.com/download/firewalls/peerguardian/_1225.html
